name: Croatian Crop Protection association
membership: CROCPA is a member of ECPA (European Crop protection association)
goal: The main objective of the Association shall be the advancement, promotion and protection of the common objectives of the manufactures and representatives of plant protection products.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Food Safety
euInitiatives: The Association shall advocate the safe use of plant protection products, harmonisation of national legislation with EU legislation in relation to manufacturing, labelling, etc. of plant protection products, for the use of the aforementioned products in accordance with ICM/IPM and the protection of common interests of holders of industrial property rights in the interests of scientific and technical development
